data.title: When Harlie Was One by Gerrold, First Edition
data.meta_description: WHEN HARLIE WAS ONE by Gerrold, David. and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Octavo, boards. First edition. First printing with code "C22" on page 246. Anatomy of Wonder (2004) II-433. Survey of Science Fiction Literature V, pp. 2455-8. Issued by the Science Fiction Book Club. Mild bruise to upper spine end, else a fine copy in fine dust jacket with faint matching bruise. (#104901).

Condition: Very Good. Signed Copy First edition copy. . Very Good dust jacket. Book Club Edition. Signed by author on customized label. Near Fine book. Very Good dust jacket. From the library of science fiction and fantasy writer, editor, publisher and prolific book reviewer D. Douglas Fratz. (science fiction, fantasy, artificial intelligence).

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Marty Jacobs; (illustrator). First Edition. 247 pp. Yellow boards lettered in orange on the spine; headband. Book Club Edition C22, the first edition, predating the paperback by three months. Wear at the corners of the dustjacket; no interior markings. Dustjacket by Marty Jacobs. Size: 8vo. Book.

Hardcover. Condition: Near Fine. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Marty Jacobs, dj art. (illustrator). 1st Hardcover Edition 1st Printing. This Book Club Edition is the First Hardcover Edition of a Paperback Original. The dust jacket has light wear to the covers and is unclipped but also unpriced. Signed by the author on the title page.
